action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: a small plane flies over a body of water with many sailboats and a city in the background.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: A black cat is laying on a plaid fabric with a book on top of it that is titled The Hobbit.

This is my DESCRIPTION: a small plane flies over a body of water with many sailboats and a city in the background.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: is there a cat on the book in your image?

This is my DESCRIPTION: A black cat is laying on a plaid fabric with a book on top of it that is titled The Hobbit.
QUESTION: is there a cat on the book in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
